attributes.action: Provide FULL free NHS funding for the elderly suffering from Dementia or Alzheimers Disease and living either at home, in care homes, or in nursing homes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We recently tried to obtain funding for an 89 year old relative in a care home. Blackpool Social Services repeatedly ignored our request to arrange an assessment, only doing so after intervention by our MP. She was refused funding because she can lift food on a fork to her mouth even though carers have to cut the food up.  She was considered capable of looking after herself.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Provide FULL free NHS funding for the elderly suffering from Dementia or Alzheimers Disease and living either at home, in care homes, or in nursing homes."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15007.asp
